mechanics.condition: Caster targets an unoccupied space within range that is visible to them
mechanics.outcome: A phantom watchdog is conjured in the target space

mechanics.condition: Spell duration expires OR Caster uses an action to dismiss the hound OR Caster moves more than 100 feet away from the hound

mechanics.trigger: Creature attempts to perceive the hound
mechanics.outcome: The hound is invisible to that creature

mechanics.trigger: Hound is targeted by an attack or harmful effect
mechanics.condition: Any attempt to harm the hound
mechanics.outcome: The hound cannot be harmed and takes no damage

mechanics.trigger: Creature comes within 30 feet of the hound
mechanics.condition: Creature is Small or larger AND Creature has NOT spoken the specified password

mechanics.outcome: The hound can see invisible creatures

mechanics.condition: Target is on the Ethereal Plane
mechanics.outcome: The hound can see into the Ethereal Plane

mechanics.condition: At least one creature hostile to the caster is within 5 feet of the hound
mechanics.outcome: The hound attempts to bite one hostile creature within 5 feet

mechanics.trigger: Hound makes a bite attack roll
mechanics.outcome: Attack bonus = Caster's Spellcasting Ability Modifier + Caster's Proficiency Bonus

mechanics.condition: Attack roll result meets or exceeds target's AC

description_text: You conjure a phantom watchdog in an unoccupied space that you can see within range, where it remains for the duration, until you dismiss it as an action, or until you move more than 100 feet away from it. The hound is invisible to all creatures except you and can't be harmed. When a Small or larger creature comes within 30 feet of it without first speaking the password that you specify when you cast this spell, the hound starts barking loudly. The hound sees invisible creatures and can see into the Ethereal Plane. It ignores illusions. At the start of each of your turns, the hound attempts to bite one creature within 5 feet of it that is hostile to you. The hound's attack bonus is equal to your spellcasting ability modifier + your proficiency bonus. On a hit, it deals 4d8 piercing damage.
